data.message: Eminem is an excellent Rapper but he should shut his pie hole when comes to politics. As Americans we stand by every President ever elected until Hollywood decided they didn't like the outcome. They're all puppets of Hollywood. Period.

replies.message:
I think it's funny when people like you say that celebrities should keep their mouths shut about politics. Are they not American citizens? Do they not pay taxes? Do they not vote? What the hell gives anyone the right to tell someone whether or not they can have an opinion,or a say in how their country is being run by "Their" representatives? 
Being a celebrity doesn't make them.any less relevant then you or the next person.
Also let's not forget Trump was a celebrity before running for President,so by your logic, he should keep his mouth shut about politics, right?
Agreed, why should he keep his opinion to himself when everyone else can sit and talk shit on trump every single day, just because hes famous doesnt mean he shouldnt get an opinion
